data.name: Full Metal Sergeant
data.detailed_description:
Other games by CarloC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1240550/Until_the_Last_Plane/


Subscribe to get notified when closed beta will be available


About the Game

You have 12 weeks to turn the recuits into soldiers!




Develop your training schedule. If their Stamina runs out or if their Stress becomes too much, they may fail their training... or worse. More effective advanced training can be unlocked by expending Prestige Points.



Improve your soldiers and earn more Prestige Points when they graduate. Qualify them as riflemen divers, snipers, or paratroopers.



Do you have the right recruit to win a 100m sprint? Or to challenge a naval academy in a swimming compeition? What about the marksmanship challenge?



Check your men's skill in mission. Make choices based on the encounters you find. Have you based your traiining program on agility and close-combat? Then better a sneak approach...

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1698350/Full_Metal_Sergeant/

data.short_description: As a drill instructor you have 12 weeks to transform flabby recruits into lean war machines. Develop your boot camp. Manage their training. Insult them with no remorse! Sir! Yes, Sir!
data.reviews:
“What is your major malfunction?!”
GySgt. Hartman

“This is the AK-47 assault rifle, the preferred weapon of your enemy”
GySgt. Highway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7, 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: More core = more fun, but with 4 you'll be ok.
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: The integrated gpu will be enough.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, because you need to hear me shout!
  • Additional Notes: ...and a brain smart enough not to get caught in my barbed wire!
